Comment: reader variable "rr" should be a single letter "r", or two letters starting with "r" followed by a number for more readability [See Code Review Comments](https://github.com/codelingo/codelingo/blob/master/tenets/codelingo/code-review-comments/FULL_TEXT.md#variable-names)

reader variable "reader" should be a single letter "r", or two letters starting with "r" followed by a number for more readability [See Code Review Comments](https://github.com/codelingo/codelingo/blob/master/tenets/codelingo/code-review-comments/FULL_TEXT.md#variable-names)

reader variable "b1" should be a single letter "r", or two letters starting with "r" followed by a number for more readability [See Code Review Comments](https://github.com/codelingo/codelingo/blob/master/tenets/codelingo/code-review-comments/FULL_TEXT.md#variable-names)
